Events that occurred on 3 May.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1954 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 144a.
1966 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Roger Verhulst.
1968 - Author Michael D.C. Drout is born.
1981 - The ninth episode of the 1981 radio adaptation of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC Radio 4.
1989 - Voice actor William Squire dies.
1996 - Author and academic Charles Moorman dies.
2009 - The fan film The Hunt for Gollum is released online.
2018 - Beren and LÃºthien is published in paperback.
2019 - The biographical film, Tolkien, is released in the United Kingdom.

content.title: In Arda
content.content: There are no known events for this date.
